https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6omT0XlLu7dQ6ld62QsIB97GRZW.jpg Beslan will forever be synonymous with the murder of hundreds of innocent children. One year on, how is the town coping? Our documentary this week is a harrowing and powerful new film on the school siege and its enduring legacy. A Prayer for Beslan
